title: Govt utilizing all available resources to resolve ‘missing person’ cases: Minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 2 (APP):Federal Minister for Law Azam Nazir Tarar on Friday said that incumbent government is utilizing all available resources to resolve “missing person” cases.
The government is playing responsible role for security, safety and respect of all the citizens, he said while talking to a private television channel.
For missing person families, he said the government has announced a heavy package for them.
Commenting on the role of Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf (PTI), he said the dialogue is the only way to address the political affairs. However, he said that the PTI should work for national interest and avoid to struggle for personal gains.
